content: <@!552133098075193354> where can i find the 1559-capable besu? I'll try to peer it with this 2 geth node testnet

author: timbeiko
content: Any recent release will work (`brew install besu`), and you will need to run it with `--Xeip1559-enabled=true`). You can get the other 1559 options under `--Xhelp`. All experimental options are there.

author: timbeiko
content:
You may need to set these other options:
```
      --Xeip1559-basefee-max-change-denominator=<basefeeMaxChangeDenominator>

      --Xeip1559-enabled=<eip1559Enabled>
         Enable experimental EIP-1559 fee market change (default: false)
      --Xeip1559-initial-base-fee=<initialBasefee>

      --Xeip1559-migration-duration-in-blocks=<migrationDurationInBlocks>
```
